original_text: They had breastplates like breastplates of iron, and the sound of their wings was like the thundering of many horses and chariots rushing into battle.
korean_text: 또 철 호심경 같은 호심경이 있고 그 날개들의 소리는 병거와 많은 말들이 전쟁터로 달려 들어가는 소리 같으며

sentences.original_text: They had breastplates like breastplates of iron
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 쇠 흉같과 같은 흉갑을 가지고 있었고

sentences.original_text: and the sound of their wings
was like the thundering of many horses
